name: pnp-sp-dev-spfx-web-parts-react-teams-tab-suggested-members
title: Group members suggestion
shortDescription: This web part uses Graph API to suggest you members to add to a group (based on People endpoint), so you can easily add those members to the Group / Teams. It can be used as a SharePoint web part or Teams tab
longDescription: This web part uses Graph API to suggest you members to add to a group (based on People endpoint), so you can easily add those members to the Group / Teams. It can be used as a SharePoint web part or Teams tab

references.name: Build your first SharePoint client-side web part
references.description: Client-side web parts are client-side components that run in the context of a SharePoint page. Client-side web parts can be deployed to SharePoint environments that support the SharePoint Framework. You can also use modern JavaScript web frameworks, tools, and libraries to build them.
